params._offerId: Id of the offer to buy

params._amount: Amount the bettor wants to buy the offers with
params._offerIdArr: Array of the id of the offers to buy

params._offerId: Id of the offer to close

constructor.details: The owner variable is set to the address of the caller of the constructor and the address is set as an admin

params._amount: Amount the bookmaker is putting on the offer
params._eventId: Id of the event the offer is created on
params._outcome: Outcome of the event the bookmaker is opening the offer on
params._price: Price the bookmaker is selling the offer for

removeAdmin(address).details: The value in the admins mapping is set to false at the passed address key

params._addr: The address to unset from admins

addAdmin(address).notice: Add passed address as an admin

addEvent(bytes32,uint256[],bytes10[]).notice: Add new event to smart contract. The details of the event are found in the ipfs address passed

buyOffer(uint256,uint256).notice: Fully or partly buy an offer and open a bet according to the parameters

buyOfferBulk(uint256[],uint256).notice: Fully or partly buy multiple offers and open bets according to the parameters

claimBetEarnings(uint256).notice: Claim bet earnings of a bet open on a close event

openOffer(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint25.notice: Open a new offer on the selected event with the parameters passed as arguments
